Initial commit: Business Simulation Platform

Complete implementation of multi-player business simulation game with comprehensive features:

Core Features:
- Full-stack Next.js 16 application with TypeScript
- Multi-team competitive gameplay \(up to 5 teams\)
- Real-time decision-making across 5 departments
- Facilitator dashboard for game management

Game Modules:
- Factory: Production management, logistics, supply chain, maintenance, upgrades, ESG
- Finance: Cash flow, funding, FX management, financial statements
- HR: Employee management, training, benefits, compensation
- Marketing: Advertising, branding, sponsorships, market segments
- R&D: Product development, innovation, quality improvements

Enhanced UI/UX:
- Color-coded interactive tabs with smooth animations
- Animated tab content transitions \(fade + slide\)
- Hover and click effects for better user feedback
- News ticker system for market events
- Dedicated news page with event filtering
- Responsive design with mobile support

Advanced Systems:
- Logistics engine with multi-modal shipping optimization
- Materials management and supplier relationships
- Tariff and trade policy simulation
- Financial statements \(P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow\)
- Market shock and event injection system
- Monte Carlo validation and balance testing

Technical Stack:
- Next.js 16 \(App Router\)
- tRPC for type-safe API
- Prisma ORM \(SQLite/PostgreSQL support\)
- Framer Motion for animations
- Recharts for data visualization
- Zustand for state management
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui components

Testing:
- Vitest unit tests
- Playwright E2E tests
- Strategy validation harness
- Balance verification suite
